ars_technica.armor_set.technomancer.desc: Reduces damage from Create machinery, increases speed of nearby schematic cannons
ars_technica.create_goggles_info: Augments your HUD with miscellaneous information about placed Create components
ars_technica.glyph_desc.glyph_carve: Shapes identical items, crafting them into stairs. Augment for walls, Dampen for slabs
ars_technica.glyph_desc.glyph_insert: Inserts nearby items into nearby containers in a medium radius where this spell is activated. The range may be expanded with AOE
ars_technica.glyph_desc.glyph_fuse: Fuses items by slamming them together at breakneck speed. Use Smelt for heated mixing, use Superheat for super-heated mixing (if enabled in config)
ars_technica.glyph_desc.glyph_superheat: When used in combination with Fuse, super-heats ingredients
ars_technica.glyph_desc.glyph_pack: Condenses identical items, crafting them into 2x2 recipes. Augment for 3x3, Dampen for 1x1
ars_technica.glyph_desc.glyph_polish: Refines items into their polished variants
ars_technica.glyph_desc.glyph_press: Flattens items into their pressed variants
ars_technica.glyph_desc.glyph_telefeast: Consumes the first edible/potion, or some amount of liquid, found in the container/tank this was cast on. Use Sensitive for also targeting 'usable' items, and use Pierce to shoot out items from inventories instead of consuming directly.
ars_technica.glyph_desc.glyph_whirl: Creates a whirlwind in an area, causing items to be centrifuged. Combine with water/flare/smelt/hex to wash/smoke/blast/haunt items
ars_technica.glyph_desc.glyph_obliterate: Obliterates foes by sheer force with an arcane hammer. Use Sensitive to crush items instead of destroying them
ars_technica.perk_desc.thread_pressure: Grants the wielder ultra-high-pressure air. Air refills over time - higher levels means more capacity and faster fill rate.
ars_technica.tooltip.transmutation_focus: Augments spells with Luck and improves various glyphs
2x speed for Press, Polish and Whirl
2x items processed by Press and Polish
2x chance-based item outputs from Obliterate and Whirl
ars_technica.ponder.source_motor.text_1: This block can be used to convert Source into rotational force.
ars_technica.ponder.source_motor.text_2: It must be supplied with a nearby Source Jar.
ars_technica.ponder.source_motor.text_3: Adjust the RPM on the sides of the motor, right-click elsewhere to adjust the SU-to-RPM ratio
ars_technica.ponder.source_motor.text_4: Adjusting the SU-to-RPM ratio will conversely adjust the amount of source required
create.gui.source_engine.title: Source Motor
